title: My Pixel 3a phone storage is at 99% but total files count from PC shows only 20Gb is being used
content:
My phone stopped working well in recent weeks, always showing a warning that there is insufficient storage.
Trying to delete files didn't work - it seems like files deleted didn't "give back" the space they were using to Android and the phone assumed there is still no storage space.

Using a PC connection to check how much files are on the device and the space they consume indicate ~20Gb used, while the actual device storage indicate 49.9Gb used and 99% of available space used.

How can I solve this problem?
